website_summaries.verdict: Great for large households that want a simple, set-and-forget water filtration system for their kitchen sink.
pros: Three-stage filtration process removes sediment and chlorine
Excellent customer service if problems arise
cons: Large, heavy unit may not fit easily under small kitchen sinks

customer_reviews.title: best water filter ....
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased a UC-200 IN 2011, This filter has performed flawlessly for 5 years. water tasted great, no leaks, no canister bursting... i did my research the first time the reason this unit stands out from cheap home depot type stores is you replace the entire unit and feed hose, So no chance of contamination in the filter housing when installing only replacement elements . I highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: john d

customer_reviews.title: The unit is a little larger than expected but nicely stands vertical under the sink
customer_reviews.text: We received our CuZn UC-200 water filter today and had it installed in about five minutes. The only tool needed was a crescent wrench. The unit is a little larger than expected but nicely stands vertical under the sink. I am hopeful that in five years I can be back on here writing a five start follow up review.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: CuZn is the water filter systems on Amazon right now. They do not disappoint and will resolve it for you if you’re not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: DON'T WASTE YOUR TIME AND MONEY!
customer_reviews.text: This product may be not for making drinking water. The quality of the water is the same as pipe line water before filtered. The ice looks very cloudy same as nonfiltered. What I need to pay a $120 for? Don't trust the high positive Amazon customer reviews. It seems like sellers have a newer method to create the fake reviews. The included 3/8" water line is useless since the refrigerator ice maker needs 1/4" connector so I need to run to hardware store to buy some 1/4" adaptors to install it. .
customer_reviews.author: Angkor7

customer_reviews.title: Failed but remedy in the works.
customer_reviews.text: I installed this filter eight months ago. The filter worked well and the water that it dispensed tasted fine. Last night the filter failed and leaked gallons of water into my tenants apartment below. The unit failed at the top and bottom cap. This unit has seen very little use. Worked well...failed spectacularly. CuZn has reached out to me to find out what went wrong with the water filter and to replace or refund it. Every company has products that fail. Not every company stands by their product and have great costumer service. Thank you CuZu.
customer_reviews.author: walter

customer_reviews.title: Not the filtered water quality I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. Not the result I was looking for. I wanted a filter in order to stop buying filtered water. I am a tea lover and the tea tastes and looks awful when using tap water. This filter did not solve the problem, the tea I made using the CuZn filtered water comes out tasting and looking exactly like the awful tap water. If you were looking for a filter to stop buying filtered water, I do not recommend buying this water filter.
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The installation was very easy. We were happy and under the impression that we are drinking purified water. But then we had a guy visit us from the water filteration company. Since we wanted to install a water filteration at the main supply. We decided not to let him know that we have a filter installed. He did all the tests. And the results were very shocking. The kitchen faucet where we had this filter installed had the poorest quality of water. The same faucet when switched to hot water was much better. I am really very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: anushree bokshe

customer_reviews.title: Performs as advertised-
customer_reviews.text: We have water from an aquifer in our beach community that the water treatment facility manager describes as only slightly better than "swamp water." We had installed a water softener but the high iron content still left the drinking water with a slight color which we find objectionable. The CuZn filter was easy to install and other than buying a longer hose to replace our too-short copper line, put it in place in 15 minutes. The filter has been installed almost a month and has performed well, eliminating any trace of color and providing us with clear, tasteless drinking water. I highly recommend it for anyone who needs excellent filtration without incurring the cost of a plumber.
customer_reviews.author: Blokeman

customer_reviews.title: Instant filtered cold water!
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived quickly and in good condition. It was not difficult to install under the counter. We like it because it doesn't use a separate faucet for the filtered water, but whenever you turn the faucet to cold water, the water comes out filtered! This is very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Meboe

customer_reviews.title: I will give 5 star if this is clear
customer_reviews.text: I am using this filter about three months. After installation, water taste is completely different. I thought it must be from filter effect. Now, after three months of use, I could not tell what difference between tap and filtered waters From beginning, after installation testing stick that comes with order does not tell me difference between tap water and filtered water ( stick tip is still like "white" on both tap and filtered waters, not any light pink can be recognized). I wonder how I can verify filter works or not in future when filter is out of its life
customer_reviews.author: ChNguyen

customer_reviews.title: Great product and wonderful people to work with.
customer_reviews.text: I am completely happy with this CNZU-200 unit. I had a lot of problems with the installation--not from their product but how things were originally set up under my sink. After receiving CUZN=200 I called their Customer Service Department and spoke to Chris. He was great! H knew what I would have to do to make any filter system work in the poor setup I had. He sent me all the additional parts that I would need at NO CHARGE. With his great knowledge and patience, we installed the filter with ease. My wife and I are very happy with this unit and this company
customer_reviews.author: Blanche

customer_reviews.title: Skip this brand!
customer_reviews.text: You know the saying about razor companies giving away razors so you have to buy overpriced blades? That's exactly what this water filter does. It doesn't have any way to connect to the cold water except through the main faucet, so every time you wash a dish, you wash it in filtered water... If I hadn't already paid someone to install it, I would have returned it immediately. I needed it to clean water for hurricane season, I'll buy another one next year...
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Parsons

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Great, Easy to Install
customer_reviews.text: I get tired of having to replace the filters in my Pur pitcher that would sometimes only work for a week before clogging. I did a lot of research and didn't want the expense of the 5 part osmosis filter. I just wanted something that could replace my Pur. This does the trick! Easy to install and tastes great! If it lasts as long as they say it will be well worth it. The only draw back (bothers my wife, not me) is that since it comes from the tap it's not as cold as pitchers you would keep in the fridge.
customer_reviews.author: Lou L.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Bought the item 3 mo. back, to improve the tap water taste. Does the job, though you have to wait for few days to notice the change in taste. Clearly written instructions, and very easy to install under the kitchen sink. The 5 yrs lifespan of the product is one of the major reason to buy this product over others, as there is no annual filter replacement involved. Great customer service, they promptly shipped a pre-filter free of cost to protect the actual unit after I informed them in our area the water becomes turbid when the water service is disrupted due to maintenance work. Overall I am very satisfied with the product/service, and will highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: deb301

customer_reviews.title: Diminished water flow
customer_reviews.text: After two years of good service, the cold water flow has been reduced to less than half its previous amount. I disconnected the hose from the angle stop to the unit, and then checked the flow from the valve. There was no problem, so I'm forced to conclude that the problem lies in the filter itself. I'd hoped to get at least another year or more, but unfortunately I'm probably going to have to reconnect the cold supply back to the faucet within the next week.
customer_reviews.author: Pgr

customer_reviews.title: Cloudy water
customer_reviews.text: I’m returning this filter; ran cold water for 10 mins day one and day two..water is semi-cloudy with floating microscopic particles
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Awesome filtration for price, ease of use, great taste
customer_reviews.text: I did my research as so many others have and chose this product. It’s wonderful. We bought two - 1 for our bar area and 1 for sink. The water tastes great. I will say that after installation the water coming out of tgectsp seems overly fizzy/ bubbly and the pressure was causing the faucets the drip for 5-6 seconds after the handle was in off mode, but this only lasted a few days. Perhaps it was the unit finally being saturated with water internally. Love this and will get another when it’s expected 5 years of normal use. For the record we did not want reverse osmosis. My husband had one and hated the water filtration gaggle.
customer_reviews.author: JpATL

customer_reviews.title: Ease of Installation and Quality.
customer_reviews.text: I could have installed this myself in about 10 minutes or less. Instead I asked my husband to do so, and it took him 10 minutes. The water quality is similar to my really good previous filter, which was not available to work with my new faucet. In addition, I no longer have to use a switch on the faucet. I simply turn on the cold water to drink, cook , wash produce or any other use of filtered water. HINT! There was a small "Y" shaped mark on the top of the canister, so I called the customer service number provided and the informed me that it is a casting mold mark, so no worries.
customer_reviews.author: Chocoholic1945

customer_reviews.title: Great Filter
customer_reviews.text: This is our 2nd CuZn UC-200 Water Filter. The first one we installed in my daughter's home because she had a child with severe allergies and could only drink certain bottled water. This works great for them and a great cost savings. The CuZn UC-200 is very simple to install and comes with everything needed to connect it all up. If not, then a quick call to CuZn and they will send out the fittings needed. I found their customer service to be second to none. Be ready for a couple of days of cloudy water until the carbon particulates are flushed through, after that you would never know it. Water is clear and clean tasting, with less staining.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Drastic improvement!
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to install. A definite improvement over city water. I like the taste of my water now and I no longer buy bottled. I even noticed a change in my dog. He normally had a pretty bad doggy smell. We tried bathing with different shampoos and changing his food; nothing worked more then a day or so. I caulked it up to something in the yard. But after adding this filter I noticed he didn't smell as bad anymore.
customer_reviews.author: A. Heimdal

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install but maybe not good for 5 years as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install and for the first year the chlorine smell and awful city water taste were gone. Now that we're into our second year the chlorine smell is back even though we try to limit the cold water use when possible to drinking and cooking in the kitchen sink. There is a clear difference in taste and smell between the fridge filter which only lasts 6 months but has no taste/smell and this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy this and reduce the use of plastic bottles
customer_reviews.text: A great substitute for bottled water. Installed well over a month ago this unit is still delivering. First, this company must read reviews and make adjustments as a couple of stated review issues had been corrected by the time I received my unit early in July: It now comes supplied with a standard 3/8" connection hose of adequate length. The inflow and outflow connections are now clearly marked on the packaging. It is ridiculously easy to install, perhaps 20 minutes max, and no extra trips to the hardware store. The cold water flow is just slightly reduced. We no longer buy bottled water or over-priced refrigerator filters.
customer_reviews.author: TJC

customer_reviews.title: Water has no distinct improved taste
customer_reviews.text: I was really hoping to find a water filter, that would improve the taste of my water. This product was a huge let down. Does not really live up to the hype :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This Filter's A Winner!
customer_reviews.text: Our municipal water isn't very tasty, and we have been putting up with it for a while. Finally, I decided to look for a filter I could install under my kitchen sink to make the water taste better. This filter seemed to be pretty easy to install, and it didn't break the bank. Plus, it can last up to five years. Everything delivered as advertised. It came with great instructions that obviously were written by someone who speaks English as a first language. It was super easy to install - like maybe 10 minutes. I ran the cold water until it was clear. Then, PRESTO!, I tried it and the water tastes great! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Eric33948

customer_reviews.title: Simple way to improve your water quality
customer_reviews.text: Recently bought a fridge without an in-door water option. There are so many ways to filter water now, but we wanted something that would be easy to use, that wouldn't require refilling, and that wouldn't add much additional clutter to our kitchen. There are a number of different under-sink mount filters that we looked at, but we went with this one because of the filtering technology it uses, it's lifespan, and the fact that their marketing doesn't include any bogus health claims. No, I don't want to read about how your reverse osmosis charcoal lined vegan filtration system is going to keep me from getting cancer. Just make my water taste better, please.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Hiles

customer_reviews.title: Installed in less than 5 minutes, seems to be working very well. Tastes is TBD after a week
customer_reviews.text: Forgive my goofy voice...I have a Kitty that needs loving 🤣😸 Arrived at 3:31. Installed by 3:38. Very quick and easy to install. No issues or leaks! Ran cold water for 5 minutes and yes, a LOT of stuff comes out. After a few minutes of burping and gurgling... Smoothed out and after 5 minutes water seems very clear and almost completely air free. Had a quick taste and I'll wait to add how the water taste and everything holds up in about a week. So far... Highly recommend! Annie gives 2 paws up! Forgot to add... Packaging is top notch. Very secure and even after shaking the box, there was zero movement inside. Huge plus for that!!
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a Nuk
customer_reviews.text: When I open the box it was better looking from what I expect, it looks like a Nuclear warheads...lol , solid built , i install it in 2 minutes, run the water for about 10 min then i try it the taste was great , this unit will run for 5 years straight! it has to be solid. Now I'm planning to ge t another one for my mother in law I hope she'll appreciated...lol. This unit will provide between 27 to 28 gallons per day for drinking and washing dishes...now I have to really think about conserving filtered water and not waisted on the drain, and probably save another year of clean water before replacing the filter.
customer_reviews.author: Boubaker

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great, less filling.
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't resist the bad use of the slogan, sorry. The water that comes form this filter tastes great. It was also stupidly easy to install. I don't know that it will last 5 years, I have no way of checking its efficacy against lead or other heavy metals. What I do know is that I had the same level of actual assurance from my counter top filter jug. And this is way more convenient and way less expensive overall. good water pressure, good taste, easy install.
customer_reviews.author: knowmad

customer_reviews.title: Not good for Arizon but wonderful customer support!
customer_reviews.text: **Update** The company reached out to us and helped us. We live in Arizona, so if you are looking for a good filter for Arizona get this on from the same company:  Terrible filter bought at the end of January by the end of April tested the water and it tested worse than the Tap water. It's supposed to last 5 years!
customer_reviews.author: Ivan and Shannon Hurtado

customer_reviews.title: Great Tasting Drinking Water Straight From the Tap
customer_reviews.text: My husband installed this while I was at work. He says it was super quick and easy to install, and that he used the online video instructions, which were good. There was an initial break-in period (one day of running the water a bit before filling the glass to get out the excess charcoal that runs through). Now the water is great tasting and perfectly clear straight away when you turn it on. It is such a luxury to have great tasting water straight out of the tap, and I like this better than having a separate tap for filtered water on the sink. We will probably eventually add one to our upstairs bathroom too.
customer_reviews.author: Zara

customer_reviews.title: Lives Up To The 5 Star Reviews
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I live in Santa Monica, Ca where our water is highly chlorinated. We’ve been using Pur and Brita filters for years. I always keep the water in the fridge. When it gets warm, you can still taste the chlorine. Not any more! After installing this filter today and running water through for 5 minutes to clear the initial carbon, Room temp water tastes, well, like nothing!! It was fantastic water. I’m so happy with this filter. I rarely rave about a product unless it truly warrants it. I’m thrilled that I will not be wasting money and plastic on those disposable filters anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Samomom

customer_reviews.title: good customer service
customer_reviews.text: CuZn has the best customer service ever seen. I’ve asked about required parts to connect existing water pipes. Guess what? They sent all parts that I need. Just giving information might be good enough as a customer service, but they send parts for free. Installation is straight forward and water taste is fine. My son complains about little bit of rubber taste (sometime I feel the same way), but I think it has different taste then previous water filter. Do not drink water right after filter installation. You HAVE TO run the water at least 10 minutes (or until do not see black particles in the water) after installation. We cooked steamed rice after installation and we got gray one.
customer_reviews.author: Jongkook

customer_reviews.title: Easy To Install, Great Tasting Water
customer_reviews.text: Such a high quality item! Well built, heavy duty, easy to install under my kitchen sink. Great quality hose/water line included - not some flimsy plastic piece of junk. We had been using one of those countertop pitcher style filters for our drinking water, and it worked well, but who wants to keep filling it up, changing filters every couple of months, etc. Moving to an in-line filter is more convenient AND the water tastes even better now! Installation was very easy, the instructions are clear, and the videos are super helpful too. Only recently installed so I can't speak to its longevity, but I'm more than happy so far.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Freedom from counter filters
customer_reviews.text: This unit is super easy to install - IF your valves are not frozen. If they are it's time to change them out anyway. I Cannot drink this city chlorinated water! I've been using a Brita for a decade and finally got settled and tired of filling a container. This has So changed my life! Now I just go into the Kitchen and draw a glass of water. The only downside is that it's flat and tasteless. I sometimes pour it from glass to glass a couple of times to try and oxygenate it slightly. I love it no matter the taste - I'm not ingesting quite so many chemicals now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT take chemical taste out of city water!!
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand all the great reviews. I have purchased two of these, and neither one takes the taste out of my city water. It only tastes very slightly different than if there was no filter. Honestly, a Brita filter does a far better job of making the water taste good. Unfortunately, it's too much of a pain to uninstall and send it back for a refund. Absolute waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: planetmango

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: While I cannot yet speak to the longevity of this product, I am very happy with it so far. Installation was a BREEZE, took me about 10 minutes total. After letting the water run for 3-5 minutes the carbon dust and air bubbles went away and now I am just left with delicious clear water! I compared the newly filtered water with a glass of water I filled before the install. After tasting the filtered water, my unfiltered water tastes like it came from a dirty pool! This is a much better option than a Brita pitcher or faucet mounted filter which needs to be changed every 1-3 months. Do it!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Washburn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome filter!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to install a separate faucet for drinking. I searched for water filter options and found this works best for me because it is super easy to install. I am one of those super lazy people that hate doing maintenance work. Like changing batteries, changing the refrigerator water filter and such. So when I found this product that needs replacing only after 5 years I was sold. AND it is super easy to install, no need to drill anything. It came with a long hose. Some paper with instructions. Honestly, I didn't read the instructions on the paper until I already installed it. I just looked at the pictures that you see here in Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Ninja Turtle

customer_reviews.title: Chlorinated, fluoride-tainted water filtered to bottled water quality
customer_reviews.text: Chlorinated, fluoride-tainted water filtered to bottled water quality. We have this on our kitchen sink (obviously) and the water pressure/flow rate was unaffected. What was affected was the taste - and that is to say there isn't one. It's just water. It's incredible. Tea, Coffee - anything with water in it that you prepare - tastes so much better.
customer_reviews.author: Zlog

customer_reviews.title: Lives up to the hype
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? This thing lives up to the hype. Setup could not be simpler. Although it did take me about half an hour because my sink was apparently designed by morons so there was almost no room to access the valves I needed. But in the end I made it work and my water instantly went from undrinkable chlorine sludge to being indistinguishable from bottled water. I'm so pumped about all the plastic we're going to save! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: luke

customer_reviews.title: It works. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I lived in a mountain house with a well for 34 years. We were spoiled with clean, clear water right from a deep aquifer. Then we moved to an urban area with city commercial water. Yuck. My wife freaked and said, "I can't drink this." I had gotten this for my daughter when she moved so we tried it. It really does the job. Highly recommended - installs in five minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Paul R. Wickliffe

customer_reviews.title: This is best water filter
customer_reviews.text: We bought a second water filter, simply because it makes our water taste better then bottled water and we drink a ton of water. Our first filter is working great had it over a year and I know it will last about 5 years but we just dont want to be without it. Chris the selling company is fantastic. We had a small problem getting it hooked up to the faucet, but Chris sent us some parts that made it work perfect. If you have any trouble hooking it up Chris is extremely knowledgeable and helpful. This is a wonderful company with folks that really care you get the help you need. BEST tasting water EVER.
customer_reviews.author: Sandilee4u

customer_reviews.title: Water tastes great!
customer_reviews.text: I installed this in September. Super simple and the company quickly sent out the alternate tubes and connectors I needed for my set up. The water really tastes so much better than it did. The water here smells strongly of chlorine, but not so through the cold water that runs through this! I would definitely recommend this product and this company.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Miklea

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Sure enough, just like other reviewers stated, easy to install and noticed an immediate difference in water quality and taste. Did a before and after taste, side by side, everyone in family, blindfolded and everything just for funsies, and the new filtered water won 4x in a row. Using it for humidifier too which is now much easier to clean! Yay!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M

customer_reviews.title: Good product, easy to install and excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: After reseaching water filters I settled on this product. The CuZn UC-200 is simple to install and is a stand-alone product. I saw immediate improvement in water clairity, and taste. (No laughing Chris W!) I called the company with some questions about using the filter on the hot side of the tap and about my problems with particulates. The customer service person was friendly, informed and interested in my situation. He is sending me an inline particulate filter, gratis, and advised me that the company has just upgrade the UC-200 for use on the hot tap. I will update this review in 6 months to share how it's doing.
customer_reviews.author: J. Warner

customer_reviews.title: That you can call them and talk to a real person.
customer_reviews.text: After I installed the CuZn UC-200 the water coming out was very slow so I called them and they ( both Daisy and Chris) were very courteous and helpful. Chris was on the phone with me for 30 to 40 minutes until he narrowed down the problem for me. Turned out to be a restriction in one of my lines I was using from a previous reverse osmoisis systems I had. Got the lines hooked back up and now all is fine. Thanks Chris for helping me to troubleshoot my problem. I look forward to many years of good water from this unit.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnnD

customer_reviews.title: so good! Super easy to install - took maybe 5 ...
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good! Super easy to install - took maybe 5 minutes tops. The filter itself is heavy and appears to be very well built. It definitely takes you by surprise if you're used to the traditional paper filters that don't do much. Water quality is significantly improved and I can actually drink out of the tap now without a bad taste being left in my mouth. Dishes rinse easier, my sink stays cleaner and overall I'm a happy customer. We'll see how long it lasts but for now definitely a 5 star purchase. Wish I would have bought sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Zarr

customer_reviews.title: Great easy filter
customer_reviews.text: Love how long it lasts without changing out filter. Had a RO system before which tasted completely pure but was a pain to maintain. Then tried a less sophisticated filter system but still had a bad taste. This was simple and the taste is great. I soften my water and still has that soft water texture. Highly recommend. Had to request special fittings for the install but sales sent me what I needed quickly for free.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Steinberg

customer_reviews.title: One of the best investments
customer_reviews.text: We have this filter for a little over a year now, we are really satisfied with the quality of the filtration, we even performed a test and the water it's better than the Costco water bottles (Kirkland) Considering that we saved a lot of money in buying water and wasting all the plastic bottles, this filter is a gold mine!
customer_reviews.author: Lucian

customer_reviews.title: This filter is AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very heavy duty filter with easy installation instructions. You replace it every 5 years, so the value is great. The water tastes GREAT - so much better than my old filter (which had to be replaced every 3 months)! The PH level on my cold water also went from about a 5-6 to a 7-8. I have not noticed any decrease in water pressure output. Whatever decrease there may be, I can't tell. I'm very happy with this filter, and will buy again in 5 years!
customer_reviews.author: DeAd MiKe

customer_reviews.title: An easy DIY project that sees immediate results
customer_reviews.text: I'm really happy with this filter. Best-tasting water I’ve ever had at my house. Not using my PUR filters anymore. I used to think the bottled water in the water cooler at my office tasted better than at what I have at home, but that's no longer true. I am fixing up a rental house to sell and even have been thinking of installing a CuZn system there when I remodel the kitchen. I think it would be an excellent pay-it-forward benefit to the new owner, who would be able to enjoy safe and great-tasting water for many years. This is one of the best DIY wins I’ve had as a homeowner. All you need is an adjustable wrench.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnoe Konnoe

customer_reviews.title: For connecting directly to faucet not compatible with standard 1/4 in compression tubing
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure I'm not the only one wanting to replace under counter water purifiers that use 1/4in compression fittings for separate water dispenser and ice maker. Wasted time at ACE only to find no such adapter. This comes with 3/8x3/8 supply line to connect directly to faucet meaning washing dishes with filtered water? Updated ...CuZn sent me the fitting I needed at no charge thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Great water filter device
customer_reviews.text: We were hesitate to buy this because it's only good for 5 years. HOWEVER, common sense tells us when you buy under counter sink water filters, the replacement filter for the under counter sink water filters over a 5 year period would cost hundreds over a 5 year period. THIS WAS SO EASY TO INSTALL. The water before and after is significantly different. It tastes delicious. And the best part is, you don't have to replace a filter in this mechanism at all. Just wait 5 years and replace with identical unit. I highly recommend this if you want great tasting water.
customer_reviews.author: Terrie B

customer_reviews.title: Water tastes good; easy to install
customer_reviews.text: The installation took 5-10 minutes; I went slowly and double checked each step and still a quick job. The instructions mention that there may be micro bubbles present during initial use over the first day or so. We saw a little of this the evening it was installed and a couple times the next morning. The bubbles go away after a minute or so and that water is drinkable and tastes fine. The water tastes good. Our main taste issue with our city water is chlorine, and the filter completely eliminates that taste. We were able to start drinking and filling water bottles immediately. It's been about 2 months now and no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Was no use for us
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my grandma to spare her of replacing filters in the Brita pitcher every month. Yes, I've read the manufacturer's instructions on not using the TDS meter, but we still did. Surprisingly the TDS results from Brita were lower than from this filter. To me it means that cheap simple Brita pitcher filters out more of whatever particles than this CuZn. I would not want to drink such water. Don't see the point of keeping it. One plus - they have a good return policy
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Best Service in the Industry, American Company and Made in the US
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research before making the plunge on this filter. Like many others have stated, it’s an incredible product and the service is among the best I’ve experienced anywhere. I needed parts to connect the filter to my separate filtered-water only faucet. Even in these COVID times, CuZn sent everything I needed within a couple days. Then they followed up to make sure everything was working great! It’s one of the very few times where I went out of my way to recommend something to others. I have a few friends buying new homes and told them to kick those door to door filter system salesmen to the curb and get this instead.
customer_reviews.author: Dominic V Pham

customer_reviews.title: tastes good and thats important
customer_reviews.text: my biggest fear was that it wouldnt taste as good as the filter we were using, but its great. no odd tastes. i think my biggest surprise was that the water flow doesnt seem to be slowed down at all. it flows as fast as it did without the filter. the only critiques i have are just ideas to improve installation. add a bracket or something to it so it can be screwed to the wall so it stays upright, and maybe include a cheap stamped metal wrench so installation can be done by customers who have no tools.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy with this water filter. My water tastes great! The company has been wonderful with follow up. I got around to reading the directions a while after I installed the unit and found that, with my situation, I should have a pre-filter or the filter may not last as long. I called them and they sent me the pre-filter unit at no charge. Works great! The filters for that seem to last about 3 months and they are very reasonable. I would definitely recommend this water filter.
customer_reviews.author: C. D. Fredrickson

customer_reviews.title: Simple install, clean tasting water
customer_reviews.text: Install was maybe 15 minutes because I was super careful. After flushing the system, the water still looked cloudy for a day or so as the instructions said it would. Water is tasting good so far. I'm in a brand new house, and the PEX pipes are still giving off a plastic flavor, so this filter is sorely needed. I have noticed a small drop in water pressure, but only because I was watching for it (maybe my imagination) and that was expected. To me, if it lasts even half of the 5 year claim, it'll be worth it.
customer_reviews.author: E. Tong

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic! Easy 5 minute or less install
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! Easy 5 minute or less install. after flushing it for a couple minutes (with the aerator off as to not clog the screen) we put some in a glass. it was opaque for a minute until the bubbles cleared. It tasted amazing. Way better taste then bottled water, instantly! after the first day it started to not produce all the tiny bubbles that it had at first. Now it is just clear, perfect water, from the tap, every time! I am buying one to give as a gift for Christmas. what could be better for a loved one on municipal water than 5 years of amazing drinking/cooking water? Thanks CuZn!
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Great filter from a company that's great to do business with.
customer_reviews.text: It took me much longer than I expected to start the project and this one only one piece in the puzzle of my kitchen project. When I had questions, I reached out to CuZn support and they were very helpful. Now that the project is done, I'm so pleased with the water that comes out of this filter. The water in my town tastes bad, not awful but bad just the same and I bought bought a lot of bottled water. The water from this filter is every bit as good as the bottled water and maybe better. In the long run it's going to save me a lot of money...
customer_reviews.author: Big Tony

customer_reviews.title: Metal connectors!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! Probably the best single stage in-line water filter you could find. My tap water tastes nearly as good as bottled water now. This filter is built like a tank! Unlike cheap filters, this thing has metal connectors. No leaks! I bought aftermarket hoses, similar to what was included with this filter, just with different sized connectors. I use this filter in an older modular home.
customer_reviews.author: Visivicous

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation, excellent product
customer_reviews.text: This is not a long-term review; the filter was delivered yesterday, I installed it 20 minutes ago. Installation was a breeze, it took 5-10 minutes. Even if there were no instructions, it is obvious what goes where. The instructions are, in fact, clear and unambiguous. Following installation, I ran the tap for a good 5 minutes, and tasted the water, which was very good. It was a great relief to find this filter, as a lot seem to have replacement filters which cost as much as the initial outlay, and you don't really know how long they will last, whereas with this, you know exactly what your cost is over 5 years.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. David

customer_reviews.title: Great customer services but...
customer_reviews.text: We have installed this water filter for almost a month now, first thing we noticed was the taste and limescale build-up to our water boiler as well as our glass bottles. Called customer services and inquire the reason, sales rep was super nice and friendly, helped me look up the water report for my area, and send me a new filter for replacement. So far, seems like the water taste and limescale has decreased, but will continue to monitor. Re-review: So after a week I changed the filter... I'm a bit disappointed... Even tho the water taste has been fixed but not the limescale... The water still not clear (still has the white film)....
customer_reviews.author: SLi

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and the water tastes great.
customer_reviews.text: i was having issues with my reverse osmosis system with low water pressure and leaks. so i did some research and found this filter that needs to be replaced every 5 years. after reading many reviews and looking at other water filters i decided on the CuZn UC-200 Under Counter Water Filter - 50K Ultra High Capacity and so far it has been excellent. the customer support is also a plus. i'm thinking about add it to my other house and removing that reverse osmosis system.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great filter,great flow rate
customer_reviews.text: I had used another type of filter and it slowed the water flow a lot. This one is quite a lot bigger and 50 bucks more but says it lasts longer. The water flow with this is much better like there was no filter at all. It is easy to install 10-15mins. I tested for Chlorine before and after and this filter removed all chlorine. I also tested pH and the filter raised the pH from about 7.6 to a bit over 8 but not sure if that's important. Water tastes good.
customer_reviews.author: Felim

customer_reviews.title: Pure water from a quality product; prompt and exemplary customer service
customer_reviews.text: I had, like a few others, read that Cuzn supplies an Install Kit for All Non-standard Installations at No Additional Cost - I did call them, and they promptly sent an install kit that contained all necessary fittings and hoses - saving me a trip (and $) to the hardware store. They even sent a pre-filter along with 2 cartridges (again, for free!)! The pre-filter and filter work with a standalone EKRTE faucet I bought separately. I had a number of questions, but was very impressed with the customer service (I dealt with Chris). The UC-200 was easy to install, and works great. I highly recommend the product, and the company for its promptness and exemplary customer service.
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful water!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new water filter! We installed it as a filter for a separate drinking water faucet, and it was a simple installation. Fast water flow, far superior to the faucet Brita filter we had with the last faucet. The water tastes just like it should, and I love the fact that I won't have to change this for at least five years. It is much heavier than I expected, but it doesn't take up much space in my cabinet. A very solid construction.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Excellent water pressure
customer_reviews.text: Very little water pressure is lost with this device. It was easy to install and fits nicely under the kitchen sink and allows room for other storage and a large waste basket. I have not idea whether this filter removes anything but the water is clear and good tasting. I bought this after the under-the-sink alternative I purchased on Amazon a few months ago, lost so much water pressure that I had to alot time on my daily calendar to fill a vase. I recommend this filter.
customer_reviews.author: Baronbulldog

customer_reviews.title: Bye Bye Disposable Filters
customer_reviews.text: This filter was easy to install and we're very happy. I grew tired of replacing expensive disposable filters. These under-the-counter filters are a better solution by far. Everyone who is concerned about their water quality should install these. Water comes out as clean as my Mavea filter used to provide. Customer service from this company is exceptional as well. We bought one for cold water and one for hot water. Not sure how long the hot water one will last but it's worth a try.
customer_reviews.author: Jes

customer_reviews.title: 1 year in use-
customer_reviews.text: We've been using this filter for a little over a year now and it seems to be still going strong. It is the best filter we have ever used. Our water is so heavily chlorinated that it smells like a public pool at times. All of our drinking water comes through this filter. We stopped purchasing bottled water long ago. The taste is perfect and their is no chlorine smell or taste. I use glass bottles to store the water and to drink from. After filling them I look at them in the light to see if there is any sediment, etc. So far crystal clear. I would recommend this filter to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: ROK

customer_reviews.title: Great Water Filter
customer_reviews.text: This water filter works great and was easy to install. No more chlorine or funny tasting water. I highly recommend this product. Excellent buy for the price since it lasts so long and you do not need to replace filters. I was very impressed with the offers of help or whatever was needed to complete the installation on the instruction sheet from the company. It also saved money since we did not need to install a separate spout for the filtered water. Now the whole household has good water including pets and houseplants.
customer_reviews.author: Rosepetal

customer_reviews.title: Under sink filter
customer_reviews.text: In our area North Jersey, we have a lot of sediment in the water as well as lead. Contacted CuZn they recommended the UC-200. They also offered a sediment prefilter. It is compact and very easy to install under the sink. The water taste is good. No longer have to use the counter top carafe filter.
customer_reviews.author: T. Baynes

customer_reviews.title: So far.....so.......????
customer_reviews.text: I installed this about 2 weeks ago. I still get cloudy water but it does taste better than before. Not sure if its really worth it though. I want to give it a few more weeks to see if it improves. Overall, it's ok. Is it work the price? I probably would not do it again. Taste is not very good, water is not clear and nice to look at.
customer_reviews.author: RD

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this water filter.
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this water filter. It makes our water taste great, removes the chemical taste and smell usually associated with municipal water sources in my area. The CuZn customer service is exelent. I have non-standard plumbing, and the company send me instantly the hoses and fittings at no extra charge. Customer service also provided tracking number, and I received hardware very soon. Installation took less then 20 minutes
customer_reviews.author: Michael E

customer_reviews.title: QUALITY PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I don't often write reviews, this might be my second. That being said, the filter was very easy to install - 10 minutes top; hook up three lines and filter stands on it own. I filled a glass with water before I changed the filter to determine if the filter made a difference. After letting the water run for approximately 5 minutes (until I got a clear glass of water) I filled another glass and surprisingly I could tell a difference in taste an odor plus the water seemed smoother. Overall, I would recommend this product to anyone. IF it only last for three years vice the advertised 5 it is still worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald J.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Clean great tasting water
customer_reviews.text: Very hard chemically Tasting water Where I live so I bought this to get me off if buying jugs. So far so good it’s tasting good and saving me money. A 2 year old can Install this thing it’s that easy. It comes with a hose but if you need anything else or an adapter contact the company and they’ll hook you up. The unit fits nicely in the Back of the sink cabinet and is heavy enough that it won’t move if day a bottle if cleaner falls against it.
customer_reviews.author: SahSidePhil

customer_reviews.title: The way water should taste!
customer_reviews.text: AS soon as my husband easily installed this water filter under the kitchen sink - I took a drink - and it was like WOW - there is NO taste!! Just the way water should taste! I was so pleased with the whole experience and I continue to drink clear great tasting water (or tasteless) water - I refuse to drink water from any other faucet in the house - even though I never thought our water tasted bad before but there is no comparison! Great product - I would highly recommend - I would give it 10 stars if I could!
customer_reviews.author: Robin Dryden

customer_reviews.title: Great Taste. Very Happy with Purchase.
customer_reviews.text: The Filter was very easy to install. High Quality. Water Tastes great! I read a bunch of reviews and on multiple sites saw this was top 2 or 3 so went with it. Says it last 5 years. My Plumber loved it as it was very easy to install, has metal fittings and does not take up much room in cabinet. Very happy with the product and feel price is very good for what you get. Have it hooked up to kitchen faucet in coastal vacation home and also feeds ice maker. No drop in pressure.
customer_reviews.author: Chip

customer_reviews.title: Very clear instructions, easy to install, great system, great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Everything is 5/5. I emailed support regarding the sediment filter and alternate hosing fittings for our cold water line and the support team sent the bundle to me free of charge with 2 day shipping! VERY HAPPY WITH THE PRODUCT! The water tastes so much better already, and you can visibly see all the sediment being filtered out. There's also a YT video available to show how to install the CuZn filter.
customer_reviews.author: K. LIU

customer_reviews.title: Amazing filter
customer_reviews.text: A really well made filter, extremely easy to install, flushes quick, the effect on water flavor cannot be emphasized enough, I did note that most reviews did not mention clearly that it has little to no discernible effect on water pressure and more importantly flow. There were some complaints that instructions were very basic to nonexistent, I found that it was more than clear enough to install the filter within 5 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good.
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea of not having to change filters all of the time. Hubby had to re-do some of the plumbing anyway. This is a substantial unit. Water tastes the same, but we had a filter before, just had to change it all the time. Lots of chlorine in my town, so filtering is a must. Now if I could get the mineral count down...
customer_reviews.author: Pearl

customer_reviews.title: BEST WATER FILTER BY FAR
customer_reviews.text: I've had this filter over 2 years. Worked great. This week, a new filter shows up at my door. Inside, a product recall notice. The company said they were notified that a user had discovered a leak in their filter. Since my filter was in the same production run, they replaced mine should the same leak show up. This is unheard of company responsibility & customer service! 5 big stars to the company and a great water filter.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Buy this one!
customer_reviews.text: after reviewing and exploring under counter water filters, i decided on this one. I thought the three stage filter would be better, however, they all required a separate faucet, which i did not want in my kitchen. shipping was very fast and connection is as easy as reported. we immediately noticed a different (much better) taste through this filter as opposed to the britta which we had been using since moving into this home. hopefully it will last 3-5 years as advertised, but at any rate, i am very happy with this. PS after 2 months...still VERY pleased, i suggest buying this one!!
customer_reviews.author: big joe

customer_reviews.title: Works beyond expectations!
customer_reviews.text: I used it to run to our refrigerator icemaker/water dispenser. It was a bear to hook up, not because of the filter, but because I couldn't find the right hose adapter. After I got those..10 minute hook up. Last summer the water level in the river that supplies our municipal water got low and got an algae of some kind that caused the water to taste like dirt...literally. Not harmful, but stank and tasted awful. Water coming out of the water filter tasted like spring water. Couldn't be better or happier.
customer_reviews.author: Joe in Frankfort

customer_reviews.title: ... received and installed this water filter and I am satisfied with the performance as well as the ease of ...
customer_reviews.text: Recently received and installed this water filter and I am satisfied with the performance as well as the ease of installation. Instructions were very explicit.I doubt if anyone will have problems following the instructions and installing this product, if I, an almost 81 year old woman, happily accomplished the installation correctly! Three months later and my CuZn UC-200 is doing just what it is intended to do. Great performance in removing the chlorine from the city water. I had been used to well water and the city water was/is not to my liking. Not any longer, thanks to this water filter.
customer_reviews.author: R. M. Tayloe

customer_reviews.title: Great filter and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Bought this back in October, but waited for my previous filter to expire before installing this one. It was very easy, with good instructions and simple set up. Water flow is really good and the taste is great. This is a very substantial filter and very well-made. Worth every penny. I think it’s the best thing out there! I installed mine on a dedicated drinking water faucet next to my kitchen faucet. We use it only to drink and cook with. I wil definitely stick with this filter as long as CuZn continues to make them.
customer_reviews.author: A. Matheny

customer_reviews.title: Easy, no leaks, tastes great
customer_reviews.text: Our town water has been tasting more and more like a swimming pool this year - lots of chlorine. Other than that the water has been fine according to the semi-annual quality report. To remove the cholorine smell/flavor, I ordered this filter and installed it in just a few minutes. Emptying the stuff out from under the sink to make room for installation took much longer than the actual installation. Result? Tastes great! And no leaks - the fittings sealed up just fine, no teflon tape was needed. The 36" hose supplied is the same spec as the existing hoses - high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Trails

customer_reviews.title: Our great USA water filter!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am amazed. The filter is wonderful. The customer service sent the 'odd part' I needed before the filter even arrived. All questions were answered promptly & completely. The instructions were great including explaining the initial white tint of the water which did go away as stated. The water pressure is so good we had to turn down the cutoff valve. We've found our water filter company & it's American made. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Richards

customer_reviews.title: makes bad water taste good!
customer_reviews.text: Installation was easy, I just followed the simple instructions. Before installing the CuZn filter, our tap water tasted very strange - highlights of chlorine with undefinable 'other' tastes. Quite undrinkable! But after fitting the CuZn filter, the water has no unpleasant taste at all and we use it for everyday drinking. I think this was an excellent buy! And the free prefilter was a bonus, it will prolong the life of the filter. Great product. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: BBinNOLA

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product!
customer_reviews.text: This filter has been a real life saver. I no longer have to carry jug after jug of water from the grocery store. This filter was easy to install, doesn't take up much space under the sink, and our water has never tasted better! It totally eliminated the horrible smell and taste. We can finally drink our tap water again! So pleased with this product! I would recommend this filter to a friend or family member for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really helped the taste of our water
customer_reviews.text: We have a good but huge reverse osmosis unit under our kitchen sink, but I wanted something to help with the taste of our water from the bathroom sink. I wasn't sure how much difference it would make, and I was very pleasantly surprised. Big difference! Easy to install with just an adjustable wrench. My water shut-off valves under the sink were not the right size for the supplied hoses, so I sent an email to the company per the included instructions. I received two hoses and an adapter within a few days. They did the trick. Excellent service and a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Faulstich

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you have the right hardware before attempting installation
customer_reviews.text: I wish the company would include or sell the accessories to fit different types of installation. I had to run several times to Home Depot and ended up finding the right couple in Amazon (from the same brand of an almost perfect one I bought in Home Depot).
customer_reviews.author: Manuel Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and effective
customer_reviews.text: The filter has been great and it was incredibly easy to install myself. The customer service team is superb as well, and provided additional filtering hardware that was suitable for my installation. My one word of caution is to carefully measure the space under your sink to make sure you have a good place to set/mount the filter as it is still pretty big (although there are much bigger ones out there).
customer_reviews.author: 馮

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: This a a great product. I replaced my older filters that required replacement every 6 months. Manufacturer support is outstanding. My setup was a little different than normal and the manufacturer (CuZn) sent the additional parts with no extra charge. I love the fact that I will not have to swap out this filter for 5 years and eliminated the extra filtered water faucet from the sink. No wonder this is rated one of the best filters for 2019.
customer_reviews.author: Wrath

customer_reviews.title: works right away
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product it worked and improved our water which meets barely drinking water standards. Easy to install .Had to buy a 1/2 FIP by 3/8 line for RV to work,but company offered this for free plus a pre-sediment filter if it was needed. Family run business there is certainly nothing but 5 star service and concern for satisfaction on their part. would tell all my friends and family about it .
customer_reviews.author: doc clock

customer_reviews.title: A great and simple solution!
customer_reviews.text: My wife has been bothering me for a while to install a water filter for the kitchen sink. I have been hesitant because I hate to do plumbing, and always somehow manage to end up with a leak. I stumbled across this product while doing some research, and based on the reviews decided to give it a try. Installation could not be easier or more simple. The unit is larger than anticipated (a good thing in my opinion) but because it stands vertically, you don’t lose much storage under the sink. The water tastes great, and I feel the price is fair for what you get. Overall, I am very happy with the purchase. Don’t hesitate to buy it!
customer_reviews.author: louainny

customer_reviews.title: Be careful with your plants. This filter raises the pH!
customer_reviews.text: This filter is easy to install. In some circumstances, a mounting bracket might be necessary. I was able to wedge mine behind the frame of the slide out garbage can. The water tastes decent enough. The filter will have paid for itself with the amount of bottled water it replaced. My only gripe is the filter raised the water’s pH significantly. I didn’t notice anywhere in the description that this could potentially happen. I used this water on expensive plants and developed nutrient lockout due to the pH imbalance.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Mac

customer_reviews.title: Great filter and amazing customer service
customer_reviews.text: We bought this filter a little over a year ago. I love the filter, our water tastes great. The ease of installing, I did it by myself and it was super easy. I love that all I have to do is turn on the cold tap and it’s automatically filtered. It also doesn’t have to be replaced for approximately 5 years. Much better than a RO unit or the like. Recently I had an issue with a chlorine taste and emailed customer service. They responded quickly and checked the quality tests for my water and helped me troubleshoot. Customer service was amazing. I can’t recommend this water filter and company enough.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett & Kari

customer_reviews.title: Our water tastes much better (now waiting for my dog to try it)
customer_reviews.text: We go to our friend's house with our dog and he seems to only drink the water there and not at our house. And our water tastes a little weird, but not enough to feel the need to get a filter. So, we go our filter today and I was able to install it in a few minutes under our sink. And now we have water that doesn't taste like anything but clean water! But now, I'm waiting for our dog to try it. It tastes really good. The filter was very easy to install. I'm very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Bartos

customer_reviews.title: Amazing customer support
customer_reviews.text: My setup under the sink was different than on the instructions provided and I needed another type of fittings. I contacted the company who quickly replied and shipped me the right fittings for free. Additionally, since I live in an area with high sediment content they provided a sediment pre-filter free of charge. They even checked that the system was running well a week later. Amazing!
customer_reviews.author: S. D.

product_meta.title: CuZn UC-200 Under Counter Water Filter - 50K Ultra High Capacity - Made in USA
product_meta.description: The CuZn UC-200 Under Counter Water Filter works beneath any home or office sink to filter up to 50,000 gallons of cold water on demand. Replace the UC-200 every 50,000 gallons or 5 years, whichever comes first. In addition to Micro Sediment Membranes, the UC-200 utilizes a patented combination of KDF-55 Filtration Media and Virgin Acid Washed Catalytic Coconut Shell Carbon Filtration Media that have been tested to NSF standard 42 and 61. The UC-200 will reduce a wide variety of organic and inorganic contaminants including but not limited to: chlorine, water soluble cation heavy metals (lead, mercury, chromium VI, cadmium, etc.), herbicides, pesticides, sediment, algae, molds, bad taste, odors and other undesirable contaminants that may effect the quality of your water supply. The UC-200 DOES NOT REDUCE TDS, a TDS or PPM meter is NOT effective for this type of filter. Use DPD#1 Chlorine Test Strips & replace when chlorine breakthrough is detected. Want TDS Removal? Search ASIN#B019N7VG1W to view CuZn's RO System. The UC-200 purifies the water selectively, allowing beneficial mineral content to remain, this includes Hardness Minerals (calcium & magnesium). Since minerals are allowed to remain in the filtered water produced by The UC-200, it is NOT the right choice for folks with excessively hard water issues caused by extremely high mineral content. Unlike carbon only filters, bacteria can’t grow inside the bacteriostatic CuZn UC-200 Water Filtration System. The UC-200 requires virtually no maintenance and installs in about 5 minutes, hooking up to the cold water supply. When you turn on the cold water of your sink, it will all be CuZn pure. New video installation instructions are available, visit our website or search "UC-200 Water Filter Install" on Youtube. Designed for MUNICIPAL WATER ONLY - Do NOT USE WITH PRIVATE WELL WATER. CuZn Water Systems, Est. 1987. Flow rate: 2 gpm. Product Type: Undersink Water Filtration System. Country of Manufacture: USA
feature_bullets: INCREDIBLE CAPACITY/LIFETIME: Up to 5 Years per filter! CuZn Backs The UC-200's Long Lasting Performance with a Comprehensive 5 year Pro-Rated Performance Warranty and 90 day Satisfaction Guarantee. The UC-200 is Designed for use with MUNICIPAL WATER ONLY - DO NOT USE WITH PRIVATE WELL WATER. The UC-200 is a Water Purification System, it is NOT A WATER SOFTENING SYSTEM. The CuZn UC-200 will not resolve issues caused by water being excessively hard (such as lime scale mineral deposits).

NO THIRD FAUCET HASSLE & SIMPLE TO INSTALL: Connects Directly to your Kitchen Sink's Cold Water Line. Only Takes a Few Minutes. All You will Need is an Adjustable Wrench for Tightening Connections. NEW Install Video Instructions Available, See Product Description for Details. QUESTIONS or NON-STANDARD Under Counter Plumbing!? Send us an Email or Call CuZn's Customer Support Team @ 800.345.PURE (7873)

3 STAGE FILTRATION PROCESS: Micro Sediment Membranes, KDF-55 & Coconut Shell Carbon. The UC-200's Process Purifies the Water Without Removing Health Beneficial Hardness Minerals, The UC-200 DOES NOT REDUCE TDS READINGS, a PPM or TDS Meter is NOT Effective for testing. To Monitor The UC-200 with Testing, Utilize DPD#1 Chlorine Test Strips and Replace when Chlorine Breakthrough is Detected. Want TDS Removal? Search ASIN# B019N7VG1W on Amazon to View CuZn's Reverse Osmosis System.
BACTERIOSTATIC FILTRATION SYSTEM: Unlike Carbon Only Filters, The UC-200 is Bacteriostatic and Not Susceptible to Mold or Bacteria Growth

COMPREHENSIVE SUPPORT POLICY: The UC-200 is Fitted with 3/8" Male Compression Inlet/Outlet Fittings & comes with a 36" Long 3/8" x 3/8" Braided Stainless Steel Compression Hose. Have Non-Standard Plumbing or an Alternative Install in Mind (such as dedicated filtered water only faucet)? Contact Customer Support, We'll Supply an Install Kit for All Non-standard Installations at No Additional Cost to You!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars2,303 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
